text: Amber Dawn Frank (born December 2, 1998)Amber Montana Bio is an American actress. She is best known for her lead role in the Nickelodeon TV show The Haunted Hathaways as Taylor Hathaway. == Early life and career == She was born in Tampa, Florida. When she was eight years old she moved to California to pursue opportunities as an actress. In 2008 Amber got the role of a girl who is kidnapped in the movie She Could Be You. In 2012 he appeared on the Nickelodeon game show BrainSurge. In 2013 she landed the lead role in the Nickelodeon TV show The Haunted Hathaways. == Filmography == Movies Yeear Title Role 2011 Monster Mutt Girl #3 2008 She Could Be You Jennifer Marteliz TV Year Title Role 2013â€“2015 The Haunted Hathaways Taylor Hathaway 2011 Man Up!
